message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CR, cs.NE 

The paper deals with the problem of detecting out-of-distribution images in neural networks, which is a common problem in computer vision (CV) and machine learning (ML) research. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper proposes a new method that improves the reliability of out-of-distribution image detection, which is a topic related to artificial intelligence (AI) and computer security (cs.CR). Finally, the proposed method involves adding small perturbations to the input, which is a technique commonly used in neural network optimization (cs.NE).
